Name: Manual_TheVault_Chakraa
description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

1.0.description:
- Initial Release with the full game
- Choose up to 100 Keys and Items within The Vault
- Crack it open for all the items inside!
- Use the help of your Goblin friends to accelerate the process!
- Be sure to use this in conjunction with other worlds as this will not run as a standalone

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-TheVault/commits/1.0
1.0.title: 1.0 - The Vault!

1.1.description:
- Adjusted the values of your Goblin friends and tools to provide less keys as they ended up being the only source needed to open the Vault most of the time

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ChakraaThePanda/Archipelago-Manual-TheVault/compare/1.0...1.1
1.1.title: 1.1 - Keys/Helpers Rebalancing

1.2.description:
Update to the latest Manual Release to ensure the correct tracking of the goal with the Decks count
